summary: Cory Weissman is a college basketball player who suffers a devastating stroke. He perseveres to find new meaning in his life both on, and more importantly, off the court.
cast: David Henrie|Luke Kleintank|Beau Bridges|Jean Louisa Kelly|Cassi Thomson|Hannah Marks|Chris Kauffman|Myk Watford|Mark Halpern|Jimmy Kaplanges|James Mathers|Alessandra DeMartino|C.J. Lair|Michael Lerner|Brad Thomason|Emily Whitcomb
title: 1000 to 1: The Cory Weissman Story
